Description: VALENTINO 100% AUTHENTIC! Coming to you straight from the Famous Ave Montaigne in Paris! Valentino Garavani Rockstud Spike chain bag in soft lambskin leather with a craquelé effect. Quilting technique and micro stud details. Thanks to the detachable top handle and the sliding and detachable chain strap, the bag can be worn as a shoulder/crossbody bag or carried by hand. - Quilted lambskin leather. Rhombus pattern enhanced by tone-on-tone stitching - Ruthenium-finish studs and hardware - Flap with twist lock closure - Suede lining.
